settings.title: Interested in joining the team?
settings.body: For nearly a decade, we've created gift boxes that support small businesses and today we are more focussed than ever on becoming Canada's most loved gifting brand. Check out our job listings below!

settings.title: Value 1
settings.body: Behind every great gift is a great story. We believe in creating thoughtful gifts that tell a story and deepen relationships.

settings.title: Value 2
settings.body: Connection is a crucial part of the human experience. We create lasting connections through shared stories, values, and, most importantly, thoughtful and personalized gifts.

settings.title: Value 3
settings.body: Every product has been tested and tasted â€“ and then some. If it doesn't make the cut, it doesn't make it on our site.

settings.title: Value 4
settings.body: You expect a lot from us, and that's not taken for granted. We're always hustling to earn your business, and we work extra hard for that moment of wow.

settings.title: Open Positions
settings.body:
Don't see a job listed that fits? 
Email erin@foodiepages.ca with a pitch for why you're interested in working with us. Bonus points for creativity. As a growing company, we're always on the lookout for great talent.

settings.text: Foodiepages has been a trusted partner of Dynacare for several years, providing quality, trusted and reliable services for important gifts for staff, clients, and executives.
